H0.text: Chemical energy changes to light energy is an energy change that takes place in a light bulb.

H1.text: Chemical energy changes to heat energy is the energy change that takes place in a light bulb.

H2.text: Electrical energy changes to light energy is an energy change that takes place in a light bulb.

H3.text: Electrical energy changes to chemical energy in a light bulb.
